name: YomiToken

attributes.documentation:
Constrctor function
Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract

`freeze? Prevent | Allow` `_target` from sending & receiving tokens
@param _freeze either to freeze it or not
attributes.name: freezeAccount

attributes.documentation: What is the balance of a particular account?
attributes.name: balanceOf

attributes.documentation: Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner
attributes.name: allowance

attributes.documentation: Internal transfer,only can be called by this contract
attributes.name: _transfer

attributes.documentation:
Transfer tokens
Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account.
attributes.name: transfer

attributes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from other address
Send `_value` tokens to `_to` on behalf of `_from`.
attributes.name: transferFrom

attributes.documentation:
Set allowance for other address
Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf.
attributes.name: approve
